[faastjs](./faastjs.md) &gt; [FaastModule](./faastjs.faastmodule.md)

## FaastModule interface

The main interface for invoking, cleaning up, and managing faast.js cloud functions. Returned by [faast()](./faastjs.faast.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface FaastModule<M extends object> 
```

## Properties

</th><th>

</th><th>

</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>


</td><td>

[ProxyModule](./faastjs.proxymodule.md)<!-- -->&lt;M&gt;


</td><td>

Each call of a cloud function creates a separate remote invocation.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[functionsDetail](./faastjs.faastmodule.functionsdetail.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

[ProxyModuleDetail](./faastjs.proxymoduledetail.md)<!-- -->&lt;M&gt;


</td><td>

Similar to [FaastModule.functions](./faastjs.faastmodule.functions.md) except each function returns a [Detail](./faastjs.detail.md) object


</td></tr>

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[cleanup(options)](./faastjs.faastmodule.cleanup.md)


</td><td>

Stop the faast.js runtime for this cloud function and clean up ephemeral cloud resources.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[costSnapshot()](./faastjs.faastmodule.costsnapshot.md)


</td><td>

Get a near real-time cost estimate of cloud function invocations.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[logUrl()](./faastjs.faastmodule.logurl.md)


</td><td>

The URL of logs generated by this cloud function.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[off(name, listener)](./faastjs.faastmodule.off.md)


</td><td>

Deregister a callback for statistics events.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[on(name, listener)](./faastjs.faastmodule.on.md)


</td><td>

Register a callback for statistics events.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[stats(functionName)](./faastjs.faastmodule.stats.md)


</td><td>

Statistics for a specific function or the entire faast.js module.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
